meanings.definition: The amount of space between characters in a piece of text.
meanings.sent1: Proper letterspacing can enhance the readability of a document.
meanings.sent2: The designer adjusted the letterspacing to make the text more visually appealing.
meanings.sent3: The letterspacing in the book was so wide that it looked like the words were dancing on the page.
meanings.sent4: Her meticulous letterspacing created a harmonious flow of text on the poster.
meanings.sent5: The letterspacing in the logo made the company name stand out boldly.

meanings.definition: To adjust the spacing between letters in a word or phrase.
meanings.sent1: She carefully letterspaced the title to make it more prominent.
meanings.sent2: Remember to letterspace the heading for better legibility.
meanings.sent3: The teacher playfully letterspaced the words on the board, making them look like they were dancing.
meanings.sent4: His words were letterspaced with precision, creating a rhythm in the sentence.
meanings.sent5: Letterspacing your name on the cover will make it pop off the page.
